events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all and the product arrived too small.
The issue has been classified as a Refund request based on customer's message mentioning refund and sizing problem.
Assigning this case to the refund specialist team for further assistance regarding the customer's request.
